headline: Texas Instruments Data Center Surge Meets First Sequential Growth In Years
summary: Texas Instruments (NasdaqGS:TXN) reported a 70% year over year increase in data center orders, turning this business into a major growth driver. The company will begin reporting its data center segment separately, underscoring its growing importance within the broader portfolio. Management issued an optimistic outlook for the upcoming quarter, indicating the first sequential revenue growth in 16 years alongside improving trends in industrial end markets. Texas Instruments is best known for...
